name: The Doctor Will See You Now
name_original: The Doctor Will See You Now
description:
A game all about how the NHS's future looks like based on how things are going, budget cuts and lack of funding etc.  The Doctor Will See You Now is a game about mortality, and questioning why someone's life should have any value than others.

While some sounds are my own, not all are.
